"The RE app makes it easy to control your RE camera remotely with your Android phone. The app serves as both a content browser and live viewfinder, mirroring what the camera is seeing. After the initial pairing of the devices, all you do is launch the app and all of your photos and videos are instantly and magically available on your phone. Once you find the ones you like, the RE app makes it easy to share your favorites via email, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and many more.
Key Features - Zero effort pairing and connecting - Live viewfinder and remote control - Share everywhere - Smart connectivity and power control - Works seamlessly with Android 4.3 above (BLE equipped)
By downloading this application, you consent to and are bound by the term of the End User License Agreement. (http://www.recamera.com/us/app/)
For the complete user guide and other helpful resources, go to www.recamera.com."
Companion app for the RE camera

HTC, the HTC logo and other HTC product and service names referenced in the Application are the trademarks or registered trademarks of HTC Corporation in the United States and other countries. Any other company names, product names, service names and logos referenced in connection with the Application may be the trademarks of their respective owners.

Always do this for me when I save files to my phone.
Make sure your %s is on and nearby, then try again.
%s will be disconnected from your phone while it is connected with your computer.
"Make sure your %s is on and nearby. If you still can't connect with it, try turning Wi-Fi off and on again."
"Make sure your %s is on and nearby. If you still can't connect with it, try turning Bluetooth off and on again."
Make sure your %1$s is on and nearby, then try again. (Troubleshooting error code: %2$s)
Time lapse finished. Check it out.
%s SD card is getting full. Tap to backup.
Please insert a high-speed SD card
An update for [%s] is available, tap Check for update to learn more details.
There was a problem downloading the firmware update. Please try again.
"An unexpected error occurred while updating your RE camera's firmware. The update will be downloaded and installed the next time you open this app."
Please wait. Do not interrupt connection.
An update for %s is available. Do you want to download it now?
When the LED light stops flashing, the restart process is complete.
"You can't install this update with a low battery. Please charge your %s first."
There are no updates available for %s.
You need a network connection to update this app. Please turn on mobile network or Wi-Fi in Settings.
You need a network connection to use this application. Please turn on mobile network or Wi-Fi in Settings.
You are not connected to a Wi-Fi network. Downloading this firmware update over mobile data may result in additional fees from your wireless provider if you do not have an unlimited data plan.
Do you want to disconnect this %s and start using a different one?
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
"Something's wrong with this SD card. You can format the SD card to fix the problem immediately, but this will erase everything on it."
%s has less than 10%% battery life remaining. It will turn off if the battery gets too low.
Shutter button captures only if %s is held in hand
"To connect your %s, make sure it's nearby, charged and awake."
Your mobile hotspot will be turned on automatically. Data charges may apply.
Setting can not be applied to device since connection lost, please re-connect and try again.
"All files on %s's SD card will be erased."
Please wait. Do not remove the SD card from %s.
SD card error or SD card broken.
All data and settings will be removed from your %1$s camera and app. You will also need to pair %2$s and your phone again.
Please wait. Do not interrupt the connection.
%s is found. Connect to the device?
Files will back up after you leave the RE app.
Happens when screen off and charging RE camera.
"%s can automatically back up files to the cloud when connected to a Wi-Fi network. To turn on this feature, we'll help you:"
You can add more networks later.
Not enough space on SD card.
Video must be at least 1 second
The memory card needs more space to fit the photos required for these settings. Use less photos, a shorter event time, or make room on the card.
Unable to access the Google Play service. Make sure it is installed and enabled.
Please upgrade the Google Play service before authorizing HTC Sense for Google+.
There was a problem signing in to Google Drive.
Auto backup requires a newer version of Dropbox. Update it in the Play Store.
To work with %s, Zoe needs to be updated in the Play Store.
The RE camera will turn off and this app will close. To turn your RE camera on again, press and hold the shutter button for 2 seconds.
View your photos and videos, then share them with friends and family.
Automatically backup your files in the cloud when %s connects to Wi-Fi.
Your device does not meet the requirements to use the %s

The password you entered was incorrect. Please try again.
Backup stopped, check backup network settings.
Backup stopped, check cloud account settings.
Backup stopped, phone storage is full.
Turn Wi-Fi on in Settings to connect with %s.
Turn on Bluetooth in Settings to connect with %s.
Turn on Bluetooth and Wi-Fi in Settings to connect with %s.
%s needs to connect to your phone via Wi-Fi. Your mobile hotspot will be turned off.
"%s can't update its firmware because the SD card is full. Make more space, then try again."
Your RE camera will disconnect from this phone and the RE app will close.
Make sure your RE camera is disconnected from other phones. You can disconnect from the settings menu in the RE app.
Wi-Fi network temporarily disconnected. Mobile data may be used.
Create, share and remix beautiful highlight videos with your friends.
Connect %s to a computer to view still photos from this time lapse.
On air getting ready to share
RE can stream live video to YouTube. Just sign in with your Google account.
Only people who know the link can view it.
Anyone can find it and view it.
Complete setup for live events, then tap DONE.
"You haven't finished enabling YouTube live events."
Live streaming videos are limited to 30 minutes.
"You can't stream live video if you sign out of YouTube."
Invitations will send when you start the live streaming.
Check out my live video on YouTube. %s
YouTube experienced an unexpected problem while trying streaming your live video. Please try again later.
An unexpected problem happened while streaming your live video. Please try again later.
Check your mobile data signal strength and settings, then try to stream live video again.
Live streaming requires at least 50 MB of available storage space on your phone. Make more space then try again.
A new update is available on our server.
"You can now stream live video to YouTube. Update your RE camera's firmware to try it out."

"Make sure your RE is on and nearby, or try these steps: 1. Make sure the Wi-Fi Direct device name is in English, fewer than 20 characters and does not contain a \\ or \" 2. Tap the \"x\" in the RE notification 3. Turn Bluetooth and Wi-Fi off and on 4. Reset the RE camera 5. Reopen the RE app (Troubleshooting error code: %s)"

"Make sure your RE is on and nearby, or try these steps: 1. Tap the \"x\" in the RE notification 2. Turn Bluetooth and Wi-Fi off and on 3. Reset the RE camera 4. Reopen the RE app (Troubleshooting error code: %s)"
